Text:
I am using Google maps api v3. I have a drawing manager class event listener as follows

     google.maps.event.addListener(drawingManager, 'polylinecomplete', function(polyline) {
          var val = (polyline.getPath().getArray());
          }
       });

but the problem is this even is trigger multiple times. Is there any way around this. I want an even which is fired only once after drawing is complete.
